divs: Sighting Detailsi was smoking a cigarette with my moms boyfriend when i glanced forward going to walk inside and saw a disk shaped object almost seemingly collapse in on its self. thats all i saw. but i would not like to be contacted unless there have been more sightings of the phenomena. it made me feel like i won the lottery. almost as if you were to meet "god" it was intense. almost too much so to describe.i only saw it for a duration of about three seconds though.
trends: There have been 173 other sightings in Tucson
There were no other sightings in Tucson on or around April 7th 2011
Summary: lava orange almost fire orange with an almost brick base
